s1 =

    0.2305   -0.8929   -0.3867
    0.9347    0.3136   -0.1670
    0.2704   -0.3229    0.9070

>> s2 = [0.222221 -0.955019 0.196358;
0.949702 0.166445 -0.265259;
0.220644 0.245428 0.943971]

s2 =

    0.2222   -0.9550    0.1964
    0.9497    0.1664   -0.2653
    0.2206    0.2454    0.9440

>> s = s1 * inv(s2)

s =

    0.8281    0.1729   -0.5333
   -0.1246    0.9842    0.1256
    0.5466   -0.0376    0.8366

>> c = [0.85606408, 0.51504797, 0.043358136;
 -0.5142222, 0.85715693, -0.029284578;
 -0.052247692, 0.002773762, 0.99863034]

c =

    0.8561    0.5150    0.0434
   -0.5142    0.8572   -0.0293
   -0.0522    0.0028    0.9986

>> r = vrrotmat2vec(s)

r =

   -0.1442   -0.9540   -0.2628    0.6016

>> r = vrrotmat2vec(c)

r =

    0.0310    0.0924   -0.9952    0.5435
